Observed at: Rocky Mountain House 3:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain or snow near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
